title: Promoting Payment Inclusion in the United States
description: In recent decades, entities in both the public and private sectors have worked to promote payment inclusion in the United States, whether by expanding the supply of transaction accounts or boosting consumer demand for them. However, more research and data collection are needed to better define and measure payment inclusion as well as evaluate how effective efforts have been to improve it.
dc:creator: Toh, Ying Lei
dc:subject: Payments; payments inclusion
